A Case Study in Investigating Sensitivity of Reliability Estimates to Errors in Operational Profile. *<P> M.-H. Chen, A. P. Mathur, and V. Rego. Effect of Testing Techniques on Software Reliability Estimates Obtained Using a Time-Domain Model. *<P> F. Knop, E. Mascarenhas, V. Rego, and V. Sunderam. An Introduction to Fault-Tolerant Parallel Simulation with EcliPSe. In Proceedings of the Winter Simulation Conference, Florida, December 1994.<P> F. Knop, E. Mascarenhas, V. Rego, and V. Sunderam. Fail-Safe Concurrent Simulation with EcliPSe: An Introduction. Simulation: Practice and Theory, 3:121-146, 1995.<P> F. Knop and V. Rego. Parallel Cluster Labeling on a Network of Workstations. In Proceedings of the 13th Brazilian Symposium on Computer Networks, SBRC '95, Belo Horizonte, Brazil, May 1995.<P> E. Mascarenhas, F. Knop, and V. Rego. An Architecture for Visualization and User Interaction in Parallel Environments. Computers and Graphics, 19(5):739-753, September/October 1995.<P> E. Mascarenhas, J. Sang, and V. Rego. DISplay: A System for Visual-Interaction in Distributed Simulations. In Proceedings of the Winter Simulation Conference, Washington, D.C., December 1995.<P> H. Nakanishi, V. Rego, and V. Sunderam. Efficient Algorithms for Simulating Service Disciplines. Simulation: Practice and Theory, 1:223-244, 1994.<P> J. Sang, G. Peters, and V. Rego. Thread Migration on Heterogeneous Systems via Compile-Time Transformations.
